0012ed7b-79bf-8000-fc81-7f0000014e7a.name: AIA_ClassificationModelVersion_RecordAction_CreateUpdateVersion

_a-0000ec36-59aa-8000-9be0-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_ClassificationModelVersion_InitializeNewVersion

_a-0000ef39-a43c-8000-9ecf-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_QR_getClassificationModelVersion
_a-0000ef39-a43c-8000-9ecf-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!SHRD_UTIL_QueryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version,
  fields: {
    ri!fields
  },
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: ri!sort,
  identifier: ri!modelVersionId,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelVersionId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!modelVersionId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!modelId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.status,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!status
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.model.key,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!modelKey
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  }
)

_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: SHRD_UTIL_QueryRecord

_a-0000ec44-cb49-8000-9be6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Classification_GetOldModelVersions
_a-0000ec44-cb49-8000-9be6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  and(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!record[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelId]),
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!record[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.model.modelId]),
  ),
  null,
  rule!AIA_QR_getClassificationModelVersion(
    returnType: "DATA_SUBSET",
    modelId: a!defaultValue(
      ri!record[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.model.modelId],
      ri!record[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelId]
    ),
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelVersionId,
      operator: "<>",
      value: ri!record[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelVersionId],
      applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!record[recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelVersionId])
    ),
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
      1,
      5000
    )
  ).data
)

_a-0000ee35-0ca2-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_LogMetric
